'''Poisonous potato sticks''' are a joke [[food]] item obtained by cutting a poisonous potato at a [[poisonous potato cutter]] in [[24w14potato]].

== Obtaining ==
Recipe is exclusive to the [[poisonous potato cutter]].
{{Stonecutting
|Poisonous Potato
|Poisonous Potato Sticks
}}

== Usage ==
=== Food ===
To eat poisonous potato sticks, press and hold {{control|use}} while it is selected in the hotbar. Eating them restores {{hunger|1}} [[hunger]]. Unlike unprocessed poisonous potato, sticks do not cause [[Poison]].

=== Smelting ingredient ===
{{Smelting
|Poisonous Potato Sticks
|Poisonous Potato Fries
}}
